title: Traditional Victoria sponge cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '150g butter, at room temperature', '150g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '150g self raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt', 'For the filling', '280g icing sugar', '110g butter, at room temperature', '1 tablespoon milk', '1 (340g) jar strawberry jam', '2 tablespoons icing sugar, for dusting']
